message.content:
Below is a worked‐example of how to match and build the tower exactly as shown.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
1)  ANALYZE & DESCRIBE THE TARGET TOWER
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
•  Total Block Count: 8 pieces  
•  Layer‐by‐Layer Layout (bottom to top):  
   1.  A single horizontal yellow beam.  
   2.  Two red “tunnel” blocks stacked to form the circular opening in the middle.  
   3.  Another single yellow beam spanning across the top of the red blocks.  
   4.  Two tall green pillars standing side by side on that yellow beam.  
   5.  A third yellow beam lying across the tops of the green pillars.  
   6.  Finally, one orange triangular roof‐piece set on top.  

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
2)  SELECT REQUIRED BLOCKS FROM THE DICTIONARY
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
You need the following blocks and orientations (as labeled in the dictionary image):

•  Three (3) copies of index 9  
   – Yellow rectangular beam (horizontal orientation).  
•  Two (2) copies of index 4  
   – Red block with a front‐to‐back circular hole (“tunnel” shape).  
•  Two (2) copies of index 6  
   – Green rectangular posts standing vertically.  
•  One (1) copy of index 15  
   – Orange triangular roof piece oriented so the peak runs front to back.  

Block indices in total (and the quantity of each):  
[9, 9, 9, 4, 4, 6, 6, 15]

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3)  STEP‐BY‐STEP ASSEMBLY ORDER
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
{
  Step1: Move block with index 9       // bottom yellow beam
  Step2: Move block with index 4       // lower red tunnel block
  Step3: Move block with index 4       // upper red tunnel block
  Step4: Move block with index 9       // middle yellow beam
  Step5: Move block with index 6       // first green pillar
  Step6: Move block with index 6       // second green pillar
  Step7: Move block with index 9       // top yellow beam
  Step8: Move block with index 15      // orange roof piece
}

Following these steps with the exact blocks and orientations listed will reproduce the target tower exactly.
